title: (x) Fnac rounded corporate face - Neophyte {Rainer, Yves}
content:
Please can someone could tell me what is the fonte on the text  
“La Fnac deniche pour vous les nouveaux talents”...

Cheers,

Damasu

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ETE_5102.jpg)

 [‹ serif caps w/ swashes / condensed modern serif - Adobe Caslon / ??? {Marten F / ???}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36233 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Kennscht mi noch?" on WWI Fokker triplane by Fritz Kempf - custom painted {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36567 "Go to next forum topic")
author: damasu

comments.content: If you’d have searched Typophile you would’ve found that this font is called [Neophyte](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20fnac). Maybe start with doing that next time? O:^)
And _Heeeeeeeeelp me please !_ really is the worst thread title _ever_, and an annoying one to boot! :^/

Here is the link to [Koen Hachmangs Neophyte](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226/http:/www.koenhachmang.com/).

And btw make yourself familiar with the [Type ID FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202034226/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq), especially the part »What do I enter in the “Title” line?«.

EDIT: I see, Yves was writing the same at the same time …
